benchmark_details.name: ATLAS: Benchmarking and Adapting LLMs for Global Trade via Harmonized Tariff Code Classification
benchmark_details.overview: We introduce the first benchmark for HTS code classification, derived from the U.S. Customs Rulings Online Search System (CROSS).

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To establish tariff classification as a challenging new frontier for LLM evaluation.

data.source: U.S. Customs Rulings Online Search System (CROSS)
data.annotation: Automated information extraction from legal rulings

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated based on correctness of HTS US code matches.
methodology.interpretation: Higher percentages in fully and partially correct classifications indicate better model performance in HTS code classification.
methodology.validation: Random split of dataset into training (18,254), validation (200), and test (200) sets.
